alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 27 at 1:28PM MST until November 29 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Kaibab Plateau, Black Mesa, and the western Mogollon Rim. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Localized power outages will be possible. Be wary of tree branches breaking or dead trees falling. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and greatest impacts are expected along and downwind of high terrain. For the Flagstaff area, this includes Doney Park, Timberline, and portions of east Flagstaff.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim
